name: Ethernet Virtual Connection Customer Circuit
title: EVCCKR
definition: Reference Identifies the circuit number used by the customer.
usageNotes: Required when the EVCCKR field on the EVC Form is populated, otherwise prohibited.
fieldNotes: EVCCKR is used by the customer as a cross reference to the provider EVC ID(s) and in many cases to identify the customer's end-to-end service.
